snippet.title: Elderand - Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
Take a look at gameplay from Elderand, a Lovecraftian inspired story-driven action RPG game with skill-based combat, as showcased during Guerrilla Collective 2021. In Elderand, explore and Fight in a dreadful world rich in treasures and deadly creatures.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
